result.purpose: This folder contains tests for the web server implementation that provides an endpoint to sign messages using ECDSA.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on a single web server implementation with clear separation of concerns for handling requests and signing messages.

tests/main.go.purpose: This file implements a web server that provides an endpoint to sign messages using ECDSA.
side_effects: Starts an HTTP server on port 8888
Listens for OS interrupt signals to gracefully shut down the server
risks: Potential exposure of private keys if not handled securely
Logging sensitive information such as errors without sanitization
